item.title: Funeral Mystery
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire a group of individuals who will wear all black with an umbrella or briefcase and watch the funeral from a distance
item.content:encoded: With the goal of the funeral attendees to think something big and mysterious was going on in the life of the deceased. A group of individuals or one individual will dress in all black attire, with a black umbrella or suitcase. This person(s) will stand far enough away that they arenâ€™t in the official funeral group but close enough so they are noticed. The goal of this service is to have the funeral attendees believe that some sort of conspiracy or mystery is associated with the deceased.
